Winter is harsh and unforgiving. Sweden is at war. For nine months, Gendry has worked...
body:
https://m.fanfiction.net/s/13302676/6/

Fanfic: Unhinged Ch 6, Game of Thrones | FanFiction

Winter is harsh and unforgiving. Sweden is at war. For nine months, Gendry has worked maintenance in a remote manor turned research facility. There’s bombings every day, supplies grow scarce and the building is falling apart. Entirely Gendry POV Originally a tumblr ficlet because i wanted Gendry to have a pet ferret. Modern Arya/Gendry


@oqueequesentes-borboletas

summary: i'm missing things that i have done without - brophigenia - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: i'm missing things that i have done without - brophigenia - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“Okay.” She whispers, feeling like a surrender. “Okay, but that’s all. I won’t be the Lady of Storm’s End. I won’t be anything but Arya Stark.”

(AKA, Gendry’s second marriage proposal goes a lot better than the first, Arya still leaves on her ship bound for the great wide somewhere, and there are sexy results.)

blog.name: qitnaryastark
blog.title: Nothing fucks with my baby Arya
blog.description: Call me Meli. 20's. Multifanddom. Lots and lots of fandoms.

tags: in which i hope someone writes this fic
summary: the world is big and round and
title: the world is big and round and
body:
honestly? fic where arya can’t handle the fact that her sister betrayed her brother and her brother betrayed the queen and her other brother apparently knew all the crap death & destruction that was coming and did nothing? so she leaves west of westeros, but the world is big and round and she ends up on far essos anyways, and she discovers many places to trade and eventually comes to realise dany was a savior in a land of slaves, and that she, the arya who witnessed to much injustice can now understand dany’s reluctance to let go of her claim to end tyranny.

meanwhile, dany gets herself resurrected by kinvara but she’s all alone, no grey worm no dothraki no unsullied, powerless and alone, she realises that threatening everyone because she feels the throne is due is not exacty breaking any wheels. so she goes back to slaver’s bay. back where she’s not claiming anything that a family only got by oppression, back to where she, this girl sold and abused delivered so many other sold and abused people to freedom.

and there arya and dany meet again, and maybe mend a little of their wounds, and complaint about how westeros and its men are truly crap (except maybe podrick payne and gendry baratheon). of course slaver’s bay continues having problems cause none of its problems were fixed, but arya’s like, “dany the world is big and round, there’s so many places they can trade with, learn from, travel to!” so together with daario (and he and arya totally get along) they kinda fix this little part of the world where they can stop being tyrannt/killer and be happy ladies bringing some justice to the world. and hey, why not, there’s still plenty of slavery in volantis, and qohor and myr and lys and pentos. arya and dany go their merry way making this cities free and installing democracy and showing them they don’t need slavery to make huge monetary gains or hold their economy because can trade with so many people so easily because the world is round baby!

maybe one day, they return to westeros, dragonstone still belongs to house targaryen after all. dany needs to impose some serious punishment on tyrion. arya needs to tell gendry she’s ready to settle down. everyone had heard of the amazing things these two have done. what do you know, it was always these two, the women of ggrm’s Big Five that were meant to change the world. so what if westeros wasn’t ready? the world is big and round baby.

summary: Baaaaaaah. When Gendry is telling Arya he knows she’s a girl, it’s the funniest fucking thing. Because when he says pull it out...
body:
Baaaaaaah. When Gendry is telling Arya he knows she’s a girl, it’s the funniest fucking thing. Because when he says pull it out or are you a eunuch and she’s says no you’re the eunuch. AND Mr. Horny on Main stubborn bull bastard says you know I’m not.

Like he knew she was a girl and he knew she was looking and he kept peeing in front of her anyways??

And then he only freaked out when he found out that she’s an important girl? But then he just starts flirting in earnest. M’lady.

I love one pair of idiot teens.

blog.name: sparkkkkzfly
blog.title: sparkkkkzfly
blog.description: 20 | Movies & TV Shows | Anything & Everything | Self Love

summary:
GOT REALLY GOT ME MESSED UP😂💀
Jamie gave "Oathkeeper" to Brienne & said "It's your it'll always be yours"
In the commentary...
body:
GOT REALLY GOT ME MESSED UP😂💀

Jamie gave “Oathkeeper” to Brienne & said “It’s your it’ll always be yours”

In the commentary Nikolai said Jamie was saying he meant his heart.

Then you have Cersei & he says “Nothing else matters only us”

I feel like he said this for her so she could die in peace.

Jamie stayed with Brienne in Winterfell for about a month knowing there plans for Cersei.

He made sure his last loving moments in the world of GOT were with Brienne.

Jamie could’ve kissed Cersei in there last moments but didn’t.

Jamie’s heart belonged to Brienne ever since there first journey they went on because Brienne saw his worst & loved him anyway.

He knew Cersei wouldn’t love him the same way ever since he got his hand cut off.

Bronn asks how would Jamie like to die. “In the arms of the woman I love” before that scene he looked at Tarth with the biggest heart eyes but you know it was “clearly Cersei he was talking about right?!"😑😑😑😑Nah

"I never really cared for the innocent” yea ok writers…..

D&D had all the material & messed it all up.

Nothing makes sense anymore.

summary:
Zombie Apocalypse AU
This wasn't how her weekend was supposed to go. Arya Stark was supposed to be going on a roadtrip with her...
body:
Zombie Apocalypse AU

This wasn’t how her weekend was supposed to go. Arya Stark was supposed to be going on a roadtrip with her adoptive brother Jon Snow. One moment they were on the road laughing and talking about what they would hunt. Who would get the most kills and what they hoped to hunt. The next became a whirlwind as a car slammed into Jon’s truck causing the vehicle roll across the road. When she awoke, her head ached, Jon was gone and she was alone.

“Jon?” She called out in a raspy voice.

Nothing but silence. Feeling a running warmth on her face she knew it was blood. That would explain her head aching terribly. Arya wiggled and writhed making her way through the broken window of the passenger door.

“Ah! Fuck!” Grasping onto the frame a shard of glass cut deeply into her flesh. Arya clasped her hand scooting away from the truck, wincing as she removed the large shard from her palm. A deep red scarlet trickled down her arm staining her black leather jacket. Pulling out her pocket knife Arya cut a piece of her olive green shirt. Taking the piece of fabric she wrapped it tightly around her palm. Within her seconds it became soaked in blood. At least the head injury stopped bleeding.

Her grey eyes scanned the area desperately looking for someone. Anyone. Glancing in the truck she saw her Iphone, completley shattered. Fucking great. It was all dead silence. Just her, an autumn chill, and the smell of…decay? gasoline? Gagging at the putrid smell in the air she pulled her leather jacket upwards covering the bottom half of her face. With the blood loss now the smell she felt nauseous and dizzy. Arya slowly stood up when she felt a sudden pain in chest.

Broken ribs, she thought.

Clutching her ribs she pressed on. The only sounds to be heard where her black combat boots crunching sticks and dried leaves in various colors of brown, red, and orange.

“Jon! Jon! Where are you?” Arya called out every few feet, “This isn’t funny! I don’t like this prank. Where are you Jon?”

Silence. She had no clue how long she walking. The pain, hunger, exhaustion helped fuel her anger.

“JON! THIS ISN’T FUCKING FUNNY!” She screamed until her voice was hoarse. It didn’t take long to hear a low, moaning in the distance. There was something about the moan and how it seemed to multiply didnt sit well. Her and Jon have seen enough zombie movies to know what that sound was. That was all fictional. It could never happen…could it?

Swallowing hard, she turned slowly to the left, to the right and behind her when the form of the moans came into view. Her eyes grew with fear. Not one, not two, it must have been at least ten. They moved slowly from between the trees. She could see the decaying corpses moving towards her. Smell the rotting flesh as they crept nearer. Arya bit her lip, channeling her breathing through her nostrils. All she had was a pocket knife. What would that do. Still she grabbed the knife popping out the blade. Her coal colored eyes looked frantically around her as she slowly walked backwards away from the dead.

I can do this, she thought, I can do this. Gods Jon where are you?

She worried for him now. He would never leave her. Maybe he went for help. Maybe he…maybe he.. No. He isn’t dead. If anyone was prepared for an apocalypse, it was Jon. Arya continued walking slowly when her boot fell onto a branch. With a loud snap it was over. The Living Dead infront of moved a little faster closing in on her. To her left then her right more and more came into view. Blocking the pain in her body she turned and ran. She ran faster than any marathon she ever competed in. A hoard of zombies on her tail. She ran through in between the trees, branches sticking out scratching her face and grabbing at her clothes. Sweat pouring down her face as moved fast as a wolf, praying to any god. Old or new to hear her cry of help. Making it to the road looking over all the empty cars for a sign of life. For Jon. A greying hand reached out from under a Honda Civic grabbing her ankle.

“Get off!’ Slamming her opposite foot down on the exposed bone on the corpse. The arm pulled away from the hand. The corpse’s head appeared attempting to bite at her leg. Jerking backwards Arya clasped her pocket knife shoving it into the head. The corpse finally laid motionless.

"Behind you!” A deep voice called.

Arya whirled behind her. The living dead she ran from were now reaching the road.

“Seven hells” she said.

“Here” said the voice. Throwing her two daggers, “s'all I got.”

Arya took the daggers looking up at him curiously. He was taller than her by at least foot. Wearing dark blue jeans, black boots, a black jacket and red colored shirt. If the shirt was originally red or because of killing these damn things she wasn’t sure. Hair black as night, under his sweaty brows, a piercing blue gaze holding her eyes. He was broad shouldered and she could tell he was physically fit. He looked strong like a bull. Now isn’t the time for those thoughts.

“Gendry.” He said.

“Are you asking or telling me?”

“Telling. Why would I be asking if you’re Gendry? I don’t know you.”

She scoffed, “I don’t know who raised you but, usually when you introduce yourself you say I’m first. Like this, I’m Arya.” His eyes narrowed down on her.

“You do know there’s a hoarde of zombies coming right? The last thing you want to do is argue with a stranger on introductions? A stranger who is trying to help you.”

“Yes when they say it rudely Gendry.” He noticed her bloodied bandage when she gripped the dagger.

“You bitten?” He asked. His tone changed from sarcastic to caution.

“No. I cut myself looking for my brother, Jon Snow.” She said sharply. He didn’t need to know the whole story. Besides they had no time.

“Tell you what Miss proper introductions-”

“Arya!”

“Arya. We get out of this alive and you can tell me all about introductions. If you can fight good, maybe I’ll even help find your brother. I’m looking for people too.”

“Deal” she replied. Both of them stood ready to fight. Gendry held a machete in his hands, a bull ready to charge. Arya held the daggers ready to strike the dead, like a wolf waiting to strike its prey.

reblog.comment:
Zombie Apocalypse AU

This wasn’t how her weekend was supposed to go. Arya Stark was supposed to be going on a roadtrip with her adoptive brother Jon Snow. One moment they were on the road laughing and talking about what they would hunt. Who would get the most kills and what they hoped to hunt. The next became a whirlwind as a car slammed into Jon’s truck causing the vehicle roll across the road. When she awoke, her head ached, Jon was gone and she was alone.

“Jon?” She called out in a raspy voice.

Nothing but silence. Feeling a running warmth on her face she knew it was blood. That would explain her head aching terribly. Arya wiggled and writhed making her way through the broken window of the passenger door.

“Ah! Fuck!” Grasping onto the frame a shard of glass cut deeply into her flesh. Arya clasped her hand scooting away from the truck, wincing as she removed the large shard from her palm. A deep red scarlet trickled down her arm staining her black leather jacket. Pulling out her pocket knife Arya cut a piece of her olive green shirt. Taking the piece of fabric she wrapped it tightly around her palm. Within her seconds it became soaked in blood. At least the head injury stopped bleeding.

Her grey eyes scanned the area desperately looking for someone. Anyone. Glancing in the truck she saw her Iphone, completley shattered. Fucking great. It was all dead silence. Just her, an autumn chill, and the smell of…decay? gasoline? Gagging at the putrid smell in the air she pulled her leather jacket upwards covering the bottom half of her face. With the blood loss now the smell she felt nauseous and dizzy. Arya slowly stood up when she felt a sudden pain in chest.

Broken ribs, she thought.

Clutching her ribs she pressed on. The only sounds to be heard where her black combat boots crunching sticks and dried leaves in various colors of brown, red, and orange.

“Jon! Jon! Where are you?” Arya called out every few feet, “This isn’t funny! I don’t like this prank. Where are you Jon?”

Silence. She had no clue how long she walking. The pain, hunger, exhaustion helped fuel her anger.

“JON! THIS ISN’T FUCKING FUNNY!” She screamed until her voice was hoarse. It didn’t take long to hear a low, moaning in the distance. There was something about the moan and how it seemed to multiply didnt sit well. Her and Jon have seen enough zombie movies to know what that sound was. That was all fictional. It could never happen…could it?

Swallowing hard, she turned slowly to the left, to the right and behind her when the form of the moans came into view. Her eyes grew with fear. Not one, not two, it must have been at least ten. They moved slowly from between the trees. She could see the decaying corpses moving towards her. Smell the rotting flesh as they crept nearer. Arya bit her lip, channeling her breathing through her nostrils. All she had was a pocket knife. What would that do. Still she grabbed the knife popping out the blade. Her coal colored eyes looked frantically around her as she slowly walked backwards away from the dead.

I can do this, she thought, I can do this. Gods Jon where are you?

She worried for him now. He would never leave her. Maybe he went for help. Maybe he…maybe he.. No. He isn’t dead. If anyone was prepared for an apocalypse, it was Jon. Arya continued walking slowly when her boot fell onto a branch. With a loud snap it was over. The Living Dead infront of moved a little faster closing in on her. To her left then her right more and more came into view. Blocking the pain in her body she turned and ran. She ran faster than any marathon she ever competed in. A hoard of zombies on her tail. She ran through in between the trees, branches sticking out scratching her face and grabbing at her clothes. Sweat pouring down her face as moved fast as a wolf, praying to any god. Old or new to hear her cry of help. Making it to the road looking over all the empty cars for a sign of life. For Jon. A greying hand reached out from under a Honda Civic grabbing her ankle.

“Get off!’ Slamming her opposite foot down on the exposed bone on the corpse. The arm pulled away from the hand. The corpse’s head appeared attempting to bite at her leg. Jerking backwards Arya clasped her pocket knife shoving it into the head. The corpse finally laid motionless.

"Behind you!” A deep voice called.

Arya whirled behind her. The living dead she ran from were now reaching the road.

“Seven hells” she said.

“Here” said the voice. Throwing her two daggers, “s'all I got.”

Arya took the daggers looking up at him curiously. He was taller than her by at least foot. Wearing dark blue jeans, black boots, a black jacket and red colored shirt. If the shirt was originally red or because of killing these damn things she wasn’t sure. Hair black as night, under his sweaty brows, a piercing blue gaze holding her eyes. He was broad shouldered and she could tell he was physically fit. He looked strong like a bull. Now isn’t the time for those thoughts.

“Gendry.” He said.

“Are you asking or telling me?”

“Telling. Why would I be asking if you’re Gendry? I don’t know you.”

She scoffed, “I don’t know who raised you but, usually when you introduce yourself you say I’m first. Like this, I’m Arya.” His eyes narrowed down on her.

“You do know there’s a hoarde of zombies coming right? The last thing you want to do is argue with a stranger on introductions? A stranger who is trying to help you.”

“Yes when they say it rudely Gendry.” He noticed her bloodied bandage when she gripped the dagger.

“You bitten?” He asked. His tone changed from sarcastic to caution.

“No. I cut myself looking for my brother, Jon Snow.” She said sharply. He didn’t need to know the whole story. Besides they had no time.

“Tell you what Miss proper introductions-”

“Arya!”

“Arya. We get out of this alive and you can tell me all about introductions. If you can fight good, maybe I’ll even help find your brother. I’m looking for people too.”

“Deal” she replied. Both of them stood ready to fight. Gendry held a machete in his hands, a bull ready to charge. Arya held the daggers ready to strike the dead, like a wolf waiting to strike its prey.

blog.title: a nice oak tree;
blog.description: a l e s s a n d r a || 2 1 || i t a l y

summary: ​“Yesterday we were just  c h i l d r e n ” [ READ ON AO3 ] F a n d o m : Game of Thrones P a i r i n g : Arya Stark and Gendry...
body:
​“Yesterday we were just  c h i l d r e n ”

[ READ ON AO3 ]

F a n d o m : Game of Thrones

P a i r i n g : Arya Stark and Gendry Waters

S u m  m a r y : What if Ned decided to take Gendry under his wing without immediately going against the Lannisters? What if Robert didn’t die after so little and Gendry was raised with the Stark girls for a while?
A compilation of moments between Arya and Gendry throught the years if their paths had intertwined before and under different circumstances.

                                                     —————-

“We started on the wrong terms, I’m sorry” she said “We’d better try to get along if we’re going to spend most of our time together”

He looked a bit wary and guarded but she could understand why. Surely nobles like her weren’t very trustworthy in his eyes.

In that moment, Arya decided she would make him change his mind and make him see just how different she was from them.

Despite his suspiscious look, he smiled back at her.

“Yes, I guess we should try”

👀 no featherbed for me 👀

👀 stick the bastard 👀

summary: Thread Noose: Chapter 1
body:
Thread Noose: Chapter 1

Chapter 1/? - 2.6k - Arya/Robb, Arya/Jon

“If Arya does not come home,” Jon met his eyes with his own — Stark grey, Father’s grey, Arya’s grey. “I will find her and bring her home.”

His meaning was clear, whether she was flesh and blood or bones, he would see their little sister Arya safe within Winterfell’s stone walls again. Jon’s devotion shamed a confession from him.

“I have prayed for Arya’s return in every godswood we’ve seen,” he whispered. “I cannot fathom her survival, but I still pray.”

On AO3 @aryastarkstits

summary: I had a dream that I was running from Kingpin because I somehow owed him a lot of money. Maisie Williams/Arya Stark was helping...
body:
I had a dream that I was running from Kingpin because I somehow owed him a lot of money. Maisie Williams/Arya Stark was helping me escape by playing decoy, so while Kingpin was off chasing her I took the time to escape.

After a while of wandering around the city (away from Kingpin), I heard from the radio that the body of a young girl was discovered and knew that my time was up, so I hid in a Target. He eventually found me, but just as he was about to crush me, he got a phone call saying that my debt had been covered and I was let go.

reblog.comment:
I had a dream that I was running from Kingpin because I somehow owed him a lot of money. Maisie Williams/Arya Stark was helping me escape by playing decoy, so while Kingpin was off chasing her I took the time to escape.

After a while of wandering around the city (away from Kingpin), I heard from the radio that the body of a young girl was discovered and knew that my time was up, so I hid in a Target. He eventually found me, but just as he was about to crush me, he got a phone call saying that my debt had been covered and I was let go.

trail.content_raw:
I had a dream that I was running from Kingpin because I somehow owed him a lot of money. Maisie Williams/Arya Stark was helping me escape by playing decoy, so while Kingpin was off chasing her I took the time to escape.

After a while of wandering around the city (away from Kingpin), I heard from the radio that the body of a young girl was discovered and knew that my time was up, so I hid in a Target. He eventually found me, but just as he was about to crush me, he got a phone call saying that my debt had been covered and I was let go.
trail.content:
I had a dream that I was running from Kingpin because I somehow owed him a lot of money. Maisie Williams/Arya Stark was helping me escape by playing decoy, so while Kingpin was off chasing her I took the time to escape.

After a while of wandering around the city (away from Kingpin), I heard from the radio that the body of a young girl was discovered and knew that my time was up, so I hid in a Target. He eventually found me, but just as he was about to crush me, he got a phone call saying that my debt had been covered and I was let go.

blog.name: cassiemortmain
blog.title: cassiemortmain
blog.description: Things that make me smile, and sometimes cry

tags: i can’t get out of my head
summary: Gendrya headcanon
body:
Gendrya headcanon

OK, so I’ve been thinking about the moment when she lies on top of him for the first time.

His hands are on her skin. And they’re tough, calloused, hard, strong hands… worker’s hands, from all his years in the forge.

When he touches her, she smiles.

“Your hands, they’re so…”

He slides them up her back, and she shivers.

“More, I want more…”

“As milady commands…”

And his hands are all over her as they start kissing again.

And she absolutely loves it.
